verses.verse: וְזֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise הַמִּצְוָ֗ה <WH4687> Now these [are] the commandments הַֽחֻקִּים֙ <WH2706> the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֛ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God לְלַמֵּ֣ד <WH3925> to teach אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> you that ye might do בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> [them] in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH5674> whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess

לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> so תִּירָ֜א <WH3372> That thou mightest fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God לִ֠שְׁמֹר <WH8104> to keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֻקֹּתָ֣יו <WH2708> all his statutes וּמִצְוֹתָיו֮ <WH4687> and his commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּךָ֒ <WH6680> which I command אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וּבִנְךָ֣ <WH1121> thee thou and thy son וּבֶן־ <WH1121> and thy son's בִּנְךָ֔ <WH1121> son כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <WH2416> of thy life וּלְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> so יַאֲרִכֻ֥ן <WH748> may be prolonged יָמֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3117> and that thy days

וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <WH8085> Hear יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> therefore O Israel וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <WH8104> and observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> to do אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> that יִיטַ֣ב <WH3190> [it] that it may be well לְךָ֔ וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after תִּרְבּ֖וּן <WH7235> with thee and that ye may increase מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> mightily כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> hath promised יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> of thy fathers לָ֔ךְ אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> thee in the land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> and honey פ
שְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> O Israel יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> LORD אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> [is] one

וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ <WH157> And thou shalt love אֵ֖ת <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָבְךָ֥ <WH3824> with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> and with all thy soul וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all מְאֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3966> and with all thy might

וְהָי֞וּ <WH1961> become הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> And these words הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֧י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <WH6680> which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> thee this day עַל־ <WH5921> upon לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <WH3824> shall be in thine heart

וְשִׁנַּנְתָּ֣ם <WH8150> And thou shalt teach them diligently לְבָנֶ֔יךָ <WH1121> unto thy children וְדִבַּרְתָּ֖ <WH1696> and shalt talk בָּ֑ם בְּשִׁבְתְּךָ֤ <WH3427> of them when thou sittest בְּבֵיתֶ֙ךָ֙ <WH1004> in thine house וּבְלֶכְתְּךָ֣ <WH1980> walk בַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way וּֽבְשָׁכְבְּךָ֖ <WH7901> and when thou liest down וּבְקוּמֶֽךָ׃ <WH6965> and when thou risest up

וּקְשַׁרְתָּ֥ם <WH7194> And thou shalt bind לְא֖וֹת <WH226> them for a sign עַל־ <WH5921> on יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> upon thine hand וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> shall be as לְטֹטָפֹ֖ת <WH2903> and they shall be as frontlets בֵּ֥ין <WH996> among עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> between thine eyes
וּכְתַבְתָּ֛ם <WH3789> And thou shalt write עַל־ <WH5921> on מְזוּזֹ֥ת <WH4201> them upon the posts בֵּיתֶ֖ךָ <WH1004> of thy house וּבִשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8179> and on thy gates ס

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> shall come כִּ֥י <WH3588> when יְבִיאֲךָ֣ ׀ <WH935> shall have brought יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And it shall be when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> thee into the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <WH7650> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1> unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> and to Jacob לָ֣תֶת <WH5414> to give לָ֑ךְ עָרִ֛ים <WH5892> cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <WH1419> thee great וְטֹבֹ֖ת <WH2896> and goodly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָנִֽיתָ׃ <WH1129> which thou buildedst

וּבָ֨תִּ֜ים <WH1004> And houses מְלֵאִ֣ים <WH4392> full כָּל־ <WH3605> of all טוּב֮ <WH2898> of all good אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> did not מִלֵּאתָ֒ <WH4390> [things] which thou filledst וּבֹרֹ֤ת <WH953> not and wells חֲצוּבִים֙ <WH2672> digged אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> did not חָצַ֔בְתָּ <WH2672> which thou diggedst כְּרָמִ֥ים <WH3754> not vineyards וְזֵיתִ֖ים <WH2132> and olive trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> did not נָטָ֑עְתָּ <WH5193> which thou plantedst וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <WH398> not when thou shalt have eaten וְשָׂבָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH7646> and be full

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> [Then] beware לְךָ֔ פֶּן־ <WH6435> not תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <WH7911> lest thou forget אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who הוֹצִֽיאֲךָ֛ <WH3318> which brought thee forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> of bondage

אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> Thou shalt fear וְאֹת֣וֹ <WH853> תַעֲבֹ֑ד <WH5647> and serve וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> by his name תִּשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <WH7650> him and shalt swear

לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֵֽלְכ֔וּן <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> other מֵאֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> of the gods הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> of the people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5439> which [are] round about

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ל <WH410> God קַנָּ֛א <WH7067> [is] a jealous יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> (For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> among פֶּן־ <WH6435> otherwise יֶ֠חֱרֶה <WH2734> be kindled אַף־ <WH639> you) lest the anger יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God בָּ֔ךְ וְהִשְׁמִ֣ידְךָ֔ <WH8045> against thee and destroy מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> thee from off the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the earth ס

לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תְנַסּ֔וּ <WH5254> Ye shall not tempt אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after נִסִּיתֶ֖ם <WH5254> as ye tempted בַּמַּסָּֽה׃ <WH4532> [him] in Massah

שָׁמ֣וֹר <WH8104> Ye shall diligently תִּשְׁמְר֔וּן <WH8104> keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God וְעֵדֹתָ֥יו <WH5713> and his testimonies וְחֻקָּ֖יו <WH2706> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוָּֽךְ׃ <WH6680> which he hath commanded

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt do הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> [that which is] right וְהַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> and good בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> that it יִ֣יטַב <WH3190> that it may be well לָ֔ךְ וּבָ֗אתָ <WH935> with thee and that thou mayest go in וְיָֽרַשְׁתָּ֙ <WH3423> and possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> land הַטֹּבָ֔ה <WH2896> the good אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> sware יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> unto thy fathers

לַהֲדֹ֥ף <WH1920> To cast out אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <WH341> all thine enemies מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> from before כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> thee as the LORD ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִשְׁאָלְךָ֥ <WH7592> asketh בִנְךָ֛ <WH1121> [And] when thy son מָחָ֖ר <WH4279> thee in time to come לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מָ֣ה <WH4100> What הָעֵדֹ֗ת <WH5713> What [mean] the testimonies וְהַֽחֻקִּים֙ <WH2706> and the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֛ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> Then thou shalt say לְבִנְךָ֔ <WH1121> unto thy son עֲבָדִ֛ים <WH5650> bondmen הָיִ֥ינוּ <WH1961> become לְפַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> We were Pharaoh's בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֧נוּ <WH3318> brought us out יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בְּיָ֥ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָֽה׃ <WH2389> with a mighty

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> shewed יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> And the LORD אוֹתֹ֣ת <WH226> signs וּ֠מֹפְתִים <WH4159> and wonders גְּדֹלִ֨ים <WH1419> great וְרָעִ֧ים ׀ <WH7451> and sore בְּמִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> upon Egypt בְּפַרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> and upon all his household לְעֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5869> before our eyes

וְאוֹתָ֖נוּ <WH853> הוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> And he brought us out מִשָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> there לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> order הָבִ֣יא <WH935> from thence that he might bring us in אֹתָ֔נוּ <WH853> לָ֤תֶת <WH5414> to give לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> us the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <WH7650> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1> unto our fathers

וַיְצַוֵּ֣נוּ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> us to do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַחֻקִּ֣ים <WH2706> all these statutes הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these לְיִרְאָ֖ה <WH3372> to fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God לְט֥וֹב <WH2896> for our good לָ֙נוּ֙ כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> always לְחַיֹּתֵ֖נוּ <WH2421> that he might preserve us alive כְּהַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> It

וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> And it shall be our righteousness תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּ֑נוּ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if נִשְׁמֹ֨ר <WH8104> if we observe לַעֲשׂ֜וֹת <WH6213> to do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <WH4687> commandments הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> all these לִפְנֵ֛י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he צִוָּֽנוּ׃ <WH6680> as he hath commanded ס
